summary: Part II of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Series explored the nuances of properly implementing highly secure and scalable solutions for building blockchain-based products.
title: The Block Presents: Digital Asset Data Part II | Full Webinar
content: Part II of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure webinar series explored the nuances of properly implementing highly secure and scalable solutions for building blockchain-based products.

The Block’s Frank Chaparro hosted Samuel Sutch, CTO of BRD, and Rebecca Aspler, Director of Product Management at Unbound Tech, who helped frame what security and scalability mean while providing real-world examples of customer anecdotes.
You can view the entire webinar along with the accompanied slides below. Part III of the series will take place on June 25th at 12pm, you can register for the event here:
